text: nimaginnu avaribbara (dampatiyara) naḍuve bikkaṭṭina bhayaviddare ātana kuṭumbadinda obba madhyasthanannu hāgū ākeya kuṭumbadindalū obba madhyasthanannu nēmisiri. Avaribbarū sudhāraṇeyannu bayasiddare, allāhanu avara naḍuve sāmarasyavannu beḷesuvanu. Allāhanantu sarvajñanū ella viṣayagaḷa kuritu jāgr̥tanū āgiruvanu
